channel.title: Few commands plz
channel.description: ok i want all these commands plz i want it so when i type they get disconnected and log in as admin/mod/owner and also i need a demoder where they log out and there non admin/mod/owner like ::giveadmin ::giveowner ::givemod ::demod or so plz.

item.title: Few commands plz
item.dc:creator: @heybaby05 heybaby05
item.description:
@heybaby05 wrote:

idk i just want the command so dont post again unless u giving command[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2008, 06:15:57 PM[/size][hr]else if(command.startsWith(“demod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“V Reside V”)) {

String name - command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is no longer part of staff");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

would it be like that???

item.title: Few commands plz
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Ok here are all the commands. Add them under

command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");

This is giveadmin

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("V Reside V")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Ok, give mod.

[code]else if(command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“V Reside V”)) {

String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

Only 2 I have, but give owner isn’t hard. It should be

[code]else if(command.startsWith(“giveowner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“V Reside V”)) {

String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Owner");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
